iati-activity.title: Outcome monitoring ENPHO projects
iati-activity.description: As part of the Dutch WASH Alliance programme 2011 - 2015

description.rain:description: Subjects: main sustainability elements, considering content and results and not main budget allocation

iati-activity.description: Nepal WASH Alliance (NWA) - a consortium Nepali NGOs working on WASH issues, with support from Dutch WASH Alliance (DWA) is working in Nepal to aid implementation of collaborative action on WASH and meet this national sanitation target. Environment and Public Health Organization (ENPHO), one of the members of NWA, is implementing three DWA projects at the urban and peri-urban areas of Surkhet District, in close coordination with the local stakeholders and governing bodies.

Nepal WASH Alliance (NWA) - a consortium Nepali NGOs working on WASH issues, with support from Dutch WASH Alliance (DWA) is working in Nepal to aid implementation of collaborative action on WASH and meet this national sanitation target. Environment and Public Health Organization (ENPHO), one of the members of NWA, is implementing three DWA projects at the urban and peri-urban areas of Surkhet District, in close coordination with the local stakeholders and governing bodies.
Questionnaires development Selection of Local Consultant Training and Field Testing Field Data Collection Data Upload

The Rainwater Harvesting Project with support from the Rain, The Netherlands has actively developed the access to drinking water in Thumka Village in Neta VDC, Surkhet taking the source as rain water. Similarly development of demonstration centres in Birendranagar Municipality and Janajyoti Higher Secondary School, Baddichaur for promotion of the technology has been conducted through FIETS approach.
This information will soon be available

description.rain:description: Themes: main thematic areas, considering content and results and not main budget allocation

iati-activity.description: • Increase awareness on 5R (Recharge, Retention and Re use) with reduce, recycle and productive use of water and waste at community and institutions level • Implement pilot to showcase of 5R component: recharge, retention and productive reuse of rainwater and reduce, re use and recycle of waste water and solid waste. • Partnership with other WASH Alliance member and local institutions for technology transfer and capacity development in rain water harvesting and 5R

participating-org.rain:remark: Owner of main programme (DWDG) that funded this project

activity-status.rain:remark: activity status mapping from IATI to RSR done by RSR import API

result.title: Outcome indicators DWA measured in ENPHO projects
Report with description of impacts ENPHO projects based on indicators
